value.name: Lancashire County Council budget 2024: five percent council tax hike - and how the authority plans to spend its cash
value.description: The county council is amongst the estimated 95 percent of local authorities hiking bills by as much as the government will allow without a local referendum. Two percent of the increase will be ringfenced to help cover the ever-spiralling cost of social care services for adults and children.

value.name: Independent candidate confident of taking PNP stronghold of Norman Gardens
value.description: IN the heart of the Norman Gardens Division, a traditional People’s National Party (PNP) stronghold, independent candidate George Williams stands confident in his abilities to sway voters in the upcoming local government elections. Williams is a pastor who has resided in the Rockfort community for more than 30 years.

value.name: I want a chance to work under a PNP Administration, says Sewell
value.description: GREEN ISLAND, Hanover — People’s National Party’s (PNP) candidate for the Green Island Division, Marvell Sewell’s main message to his supporters is simple: Return him to office on Monday and then elect a PNP Government in the national polls.

value.name: Reaction to Worcester mayor's reception meat ban
value.description: READERS, including Councillor Alan Amos, have reacted to Worcester mayor Louis Stephen's decision to go meat-free at his parlour receptions at The Guildhall.

value.name: Poll points to narrow Conservative victory in Woking at next election
value.description: A poll released this week by Electoral Calculus, which specialises in election data and predictions, suggests that the Conservatives will narrowly hold Woking in the next general election.

value.name: Rochdale: Is this the most chaotic by-election ever?
value.description: Mr Galloway is mainly targeting Rochdale's Muslim population, who make up about 30% of the electorate, many of whom are angry about what is happening in Gaza. "The people of Gaza don't have a vote in this election, you do," reads one of his campaign leaflets.

value.description: Your wife’s insecurity stems from a deep-seated lack of confidence and a feeling that for some reason, she is not loveable.
